# 1 Minute Academy
# This file helps LLM tools discover high-level entry points.

Site: http://localhost:5173
Sitemap: http://localhost:5173/sitemap.xml

Primary pages:
- http://localhost:5173/
- http://localhost:5173/topics
- http://localhost:5173/pricing
- http://localhost:5173/faq

Topics (published):
- Crypto Wallets Explained: http://localhost:5173/topic/crypto-wallets-explained — Learn how to store crypto safely in 60 seconds.
- Layer 2 Scaling Explained: http://localhost:5173/topic/layer-2-scaling — Making blockchains faster in 60 seconds.
- Proof of Work vs Proof of Stake: http://localhost:5173/topic/proof-of-work-vs-proof-of-stake — Two ways to secure a blockchain in 60 seconds.
- Smart Contracts 101: http://localhost:5173/topic/smart-contracts-101 — Code that enforces itself in 60 seconds.
- What are DAOs?: http://localhost:5173/topic/what-are-daos — Organizations without bosses in 60 seconds.
- What are NFTs?: http://localhost:5173/topic/what-are-nfts — Understand digital ownership in 60 seconds.
- What is Bitcoin?: http://localhost:5173/topic/what-is-bitcoin — Discover digital gold in 60 seconds.
- What is Blockchain?: http://localhost:5173/topic/what-is-blockchain — Understand blockchain through a simple story in 60 seconds.
- What is DeFi?: http://localhost:5173/topic/what-is-defi — Banking without banks in 60 seconds.
- What is Ethereum?: http://localhost:5173/topic/what-is-ethereum — Meet the world computer in 60 seconds.
